title: Cairns & My Wife Came Home Late Last Night
itunes:title: Cairns & My Wife Came Home Late Last Night
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Cairns

***

Written by: Robert Loyd and Narrated by: JV Hampton-VanSant

***

My wife came home late last night, but whatever that thing was on my security camera, it sure wasn't her

***

Written by: GhostAtTheFeast22 and Narrated by: Nate DuFort 

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Title music by Alex Aldea



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
